en: sp. weed used for ritual death ceremonies for certain noteworthy people
We came the day before yesterday.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge gÿo njyê gʉa tsẅɛ.
en: I will go to the field the day after tomorrow.

ngiemboon: À ka gʉa pɔ́ njyênjyê, á kaa néŋe.
en: He only left recently, it didn't last.

ngiemboon: A la semte tà ńtó, táʼ njÿó lʉ́a, à tè kẅɛɛ pǐ wɔ́.
en: He had tried so hard to come, but the next day he did not come out.
